channel.title: My very own game
channel.description:
well im currently learning action keys so i can know them off by hart, here are my plans.
[s]get Macromedia Flash 8 Professional[/s] done [s]start geting use to Flash[/s] done learn action keys off by hart || 40% done make a few little games for expereince make a few snake games make a gun game make a better gun game keep re making the better gun game for expereince make the game multiplayer X) not sure about this but pay to have it put on xgenstudieos
thats my plan X) im gonna update it once i have done one

item.title: My very own game
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

‘Action keys’

Lol no offense but it might be hard to learn a language if you don’t know what the language is actually called. It’s ActionScript. It has many similarities to java. I know some basic stuff with actionscript but not enough to make a decent game.

Read full topic

well im currently learning action keys so i can know them off by hart, here are my plans.
